about_the_game:
Navigate tight waterways easily with the practical new Ultra Cruiser! This flat-bottomed Jon Boat is small in size and constructed of sturdy middle-grade aluminum, allowing you to explore shallow waters and find more fish.

Ultra Cruiser Boat Pack includes:
• 1 Ultra Cruiser (Jon Boat)
• 6 Ultra Cruiser liveries: Ultra Cruiser Peabody, Ultra Cruiser Whirlpool, Ultra Cruiser Brass Knuckle, Ultra Cruiser Citrus, Ultra Cruiser Opposing Forces, Ultra Cruiser Dawnbreak
detailed_description:
